Feature: Risk behavior: Younger individuals presumed to take more risks compared to older individuals.
Mental health assumptions: Trans individuals often associated with mental illness.
Religious influence: Ethnic or religious minorities being stereotyped based on their beliefs influencing political views.
Health issues: Stereotypes that poorer individuals are more likely to suffer from mental health issues or substance abuse.
Moral superiority: Some religions assumed to promote misogynistic or discriminatory views.
